author: markt
msg: Get basic response body writing working.
Lots of TODOs remain (flow control is currently ignored, stream state is not stracked etc.) but it is in a state where at least some of the examples app can be used.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Youssef Khaye updated by Wei Zhang for "Adding a new attribute ignore-when (verry similar to use-when) that enable rendering or not a field in list or multi form." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4481
Or on a form of type list or multi, it is not possible to completely ignore a field via use-when attribute. Instead it hides the title and the column header became shifted from the table content.
For example I want to hide the description column from my form when exampleName is choosen as sort-field.

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-6491: Forbid term queries on fake terms for now.
